ECEA.F.summary: Societatea Energetica Electrica S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution and supply of electricity in Romania. It operates through Electricity and Natural Gas Supply, Electricity Distribution, Electricity Generation, and External Electricity Network Maintenance segments. The company provides electricity distribution services to electricity suppliers; supplies electricity to consumers in North Transylvania, South Transylvania, and North Muntenia; and supplies natural gas. It also offers construction, repair, maintenance, and other services for the energy sector. The company was formerly known as Societatea de Distributie si Furnizare a Energiei Electrice Electrica S.A. and changed its name to Societatea Energetica Electrica S.A. in April 2016. Societatea Energetica Electrica S.A. was founded in 1898 and is based in Bucharest, Romania.
